Detailed Description

Arguments for Fvid2_create().

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorCreateParams::deviceI2cAddr[BSP_VID_SENSOR_DEV_PER_PORT_MAX]

I2C device address for each device.

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorCreateParams::deviceI2cInstId

I2C device instance ID to use.

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorCreateParams::deviceResetGpio[BSP_VID_SENSOR_DEV_PER_PORT_MAX]

GPIO number that is used to reset the device In case HW does not have any such GPIO then set this to BSP_VID_SENSOR_GPIO_NONE.

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorCreateParams::numDevicesAtPort

Number of devices connected to a video port.

UInt32 Bsp_VidSensorCreateParams::numSensorCfg

Size of the sensor configuration array.

Bsp_VidSensorConfigRegs* Bsp_VidSensorCreateParams::sensorCfg

Should not be used Address of the Sensor Configuration array.
